    public class FaunusTitanGraph
extends com.thinkaurelius.titan.graphdb.database.StandardTitanGraph
    The backend agnostic Titan graph reader for pulling a graph of Titan and into Faunus.
    Author:
    Matthias Broecheler (me@matthiasb.com), Marko A. Rodriguez (marko@markorodriguez.com)
